reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://install.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Open the mpx data client at http://data.media.theplatform.com/media/client.
Enter the Username in the 'Username' text box.
Enter the Password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Sign In' button.
Click the Account Picker button to display all mpx accounts.
Store all the active mpx accounts to a list.
Open url 'http://install.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Click the 'Add Account' button.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for Account...' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for Account...' text box.
Click the 'Connect to MPX' button.
Verify success message of 'Login successful' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Get the account options from the 'Select Import Account for Account...' drop down lists.
Select 'DB TV' from the first 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Verify success message of 'Setting import account "DB%20TV" for account' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify success message of 'Retrieving import account information for "DB%20TV".' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the 'Select Import Account for...' drop down lists are disabled.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Select 'Auditude Demo player' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Verify success message of 'Processed video import/update manually for all accounts.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Run Cron to complete import' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Cron dialog'.
Click the 'Run Cron' button.
Verify success message of 'Cron run successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automation1.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the title text of every result in the search result set.
For each expected result, assert it is present in the result set.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Click the 'MPX Login' link.
Wait for 'Update' button to be visible.
Click the 'Add Account' button.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for Account...' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for Account...' text box.
Click the 'Update' button.
Select 'NBCU TVE Stage - Golf Channel' from the second 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Verify success message of 'Setting import account "NBCU%20TVE%20Stage%20-%20Golf%20Channel" for account' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify success message of 'Retrieving import account information for "NBCU%20TVE%20Stage%20-%20Golf%20Channel".' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the 'Select Import Account for...' drop down lists are disabled.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media' link.
Select 'Auditude Demo player' from the second 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Verify success message of 'Processed video import/update manually for all accounts.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Run Cron to complete import' link.
Click the 'Run Cron' button.
Verify success message of 'Cron run successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Enter title The Golf Fix 2/4.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the title text of every result in the search result set.
For each expected result, assert it is present in the result set.
